recipe.title: Nutella Slice
recipe.step: In a blender chop seeds and nuts until roughly chopped.
Pour into a bowl with Nutella and meal.
Stir until combined and pour into a dish lined with baking paper ( its easier to spread when the dish is greased before putting in the grease proof paper) and spread out evenly.
Sprinkle with coconut and refrigerate until set (about 4 hours.
) Cut into small squares and serve.
